text: Bindi Sue Irwin (born 24 July 1998 in Buderim,Crocodile Hunter Family Biography accessed 25 March 2011] Queensland) is an Australian actress, singer, television personality and conservationist. She is the daughter of Terri Irwin and Steve Irwin and has a younger brother Robert Clarence "Bob" Irwin. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Bindi's Say * Bindi the Jungle Girl * Animal Planet profile * Bindi's Profile from Australia Zoo Category:1998 births Category:Actors from Queensland Category:Living people Category:Australian child actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian television presenters Category:Australian movie actors Category:People from the Sunshine Coast, Queensland
title: Bindi Irwin
